_header: I thank Thee Jesu of all Thy goodness
_description: A prayer to be said at the ‘leuacion’ — six lines

BLEge3245.First Lines: I þank þe ihesu of al þy goodnesseI cry þe mercy for al my wickidnesse…
BLEge3245.Last Lines: …Saue þu me fro helle& bryng me þi ioye in to dwelle
BLEge3245.Attributed Title: Here folwiþ also a deuociun to be seyd in tyme of þe leuaciun
BLEge3245.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “The Gurney Series of Religious Lyrics.” 
             PMLA
         54 (1939): 369-90: 374.
